ActDepartment of the Solicitor General Act
PrecisAppointment of MARGARET BLOODWORTH of Ottawa, Ontario, to be Deputy Solicitor General, to be styled Deputy Minister of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness, to hold office during pleasure, effective December 12, 2003.
